steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Prepare release: commit new version 0.0.1 to local repository.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Prepare next development iteration on rel branch: commit version 0.0.2-SNAPSHOT to local repository.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Create a temporary tag on version 0.0.2-SNAPSHOT to ease later reference.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Reset rel branch back to release version.

steps.subject: cb
steps.desc: Push release version to remote repository. Perform a release from the remote.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Prepare for next development iteration on master branch : set version to 0.1.0-SNAPSHOT.

steps.subject: cb
steps.desc: Push master branch to remote repository

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Let's go back to the release process. Was the release succesful?

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: <i class='fa fa-ban'/>The release failed. Start investigation.

steps.subject: cb
steps.desc: Push fix to remote repository, then retry the release from the remote.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: <i class='fa fa-check'/>The release went fine. Checkout temporary tag.

steps.subject: hv
steps.desc: Rebase rel branch on temporary tag (i.e. set version to 0.0.2-SNAPSHOT).

steps.subject: cb
steps.desc: Push HEAD (version 0.0.2-SNAPSHOT) to rel branch on remote repository
